cause.description:
Give to Colombia (G2C) is a US based 501c3 that creates, promotes and facilitates alliances between international donors and the private, public, and social sectors in Colombia in order to support donors in channeling grants and as a result support the neediest sectors of the Colombian Society.
G2C encourages donors of different segments to work jointly leveraging assets and focusing talent, inviting them to act together as partners in order to bring an integrated, multi-faceted response to the major socio-economic problems that Colombia faces today.
Give to Colombia concentrates its efforts in three strategic pillars EDUCATION, NUTRITION/HEALTH and SOCIAL & ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT; which are key to promote peace, strengthen democracy and encourage equality and prosperity.
1. Give to Colombia directs its efforts to three segments of the population: displaced, demobilized and disabled
2. G2C concentrates its efforts in three strategic pillars: 1. Education 2. Health and Nutrition 3. Social and Economic Development
cause.mission: Give to Colombia (G2C) is a US-based nonprofit organization with a 501c3 status that creates, promotes and facilitates alliances between international donors and Colombian grassroot organizations.
